lines.text: Oh come on, Frank, you're just jealous because I solved the case, and you didn't. It happens.
You cut-a the hair; you lose-a the strength.

[aiming a gun at Mr. Peters]
I want your money, sucka!
Hey, what's the matter? You okay? Feeling bad, huh? It's cool, we just killed somebody. No big deal.
What are you looking at? Eat your ice cream!
You're smart, aren't you? Well, you'll have it and you'll love it!
When Jimbo wastes them, they stay wasted.
No thanks. I haven't smoked since college.
Hmmm... Yeah, well ah, I may not measure up to those college guys that your use to, but they don't measure up to mine. If you catch my drift.
Listen, why don't you just drift off somewhere and molest someone your own age. I've had a long day.
Yeah, Well ah... That's not all that's long!
Look you may be tough but I don't rob the cradle. I'm old enough to be your sister.
Oh, I like that. I've always wanted to make it with my older sister!
